
```{r}
types <- c("Peptide", "Metbolite", "Lipid")
processed_data <- pre_process(fungal_dlist, typenameList = types)
clusters <- gClusters(processed_data, ncluster = 15)
network <- gNetwork(clusters, nto = 7)

network
```

